name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
A results-driven Senior Quality Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development experience, specializing in quality assurance across complex cloud environments utilizing **AWS**, **Kubernetes**, and **EKS**. Proficient in implementing **Chaos Engineering** principles using tools such as **AWS Fault Injection Simulator**, **Chaos Mesh**, and **Litmus**, enhancing system resilience and stability. I leverage **GitOps** for seamless deployment and operational workflows, and utilize observability tools including **HoneyComb**, **CloudWatch**, and **Prometheus** to ensure optimal application performance.

My comprehensive expertise in technologies like **React**, **Node.js**, **Python**, **FastAPI**, **Django**, and **Flutter** allows me to build high-quality, robust applications. I am adept at developing and maintaining enterprise-grade platforms within the healthcare and financial sectors, ensuring compliance with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. My strong foundation in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation further supports the delivery of secure, scalable solutions aligned with business needs.  Additionally, I have hands-on experience in developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows, enhancing overall project effectiveness.
